title: (x) Script font at transfatty.com - Monotype Script {Hrant}
content:
Monotype Script.   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/FontFamily6020.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001236/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily6020.html)   
And I think somebody recently made something similar to it; the style is like the Coca Cola logo font.   
   
hhp
author: hrant

comments.content: The font Hrant refers to is [Loki Cola](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001236/http:/fontz.ch/browse/ex/lokicola).
